overrides.title: No study factors referenced in investigation file.
overrides.description: At least one study factors must be defined in i_Investigation.txt.
overrides.violation: At least 1 factor should be defined for study: REQ2025110600004

overrides.title: Study Assay Measurement Type Term Source REF not referenced in investigation file.
overrides.description: Study Assay Measurement Type Term Source REFs should be referenced in the ONTOLOGY SOURCE REFERENCE section in i_Investigation.txt.
overrides.violation: Assay measurement type source reference is not in the sources reference list. Study: REQ2025110600004, assay file: 'a_REQ2025110600004_metabolite_profiling.txt', index: 1, current value 'MSIO'

overrides.title: There is no Factor Value column in sample file.
overrides.description: There should be at least one Factor Value column in sample file.
overrides.violation: Define at least one factor in i_Investigation.txt file and add Factor Value columns in sample file.

overrides.title: Required columns have empty values in assay file.
overrides.description: All required column values should be defined in assay file.
overrides.violation: Violation on 'Parameter Value[Instrument]' header [at column index 18] in 'a_REQ2025110600004_metabolite_profiling.txt': [row 1], [row 2], [row 3], [row 4], [row 5], [row 6], [row 7], [row 8], [row 9], [row 10]

overrides.title: Required columns have empty values in assay file.
overrides.description: All required column values should be defined in assay file.
overrides.violation: Violation on 'Parameter Value[Scan m/z range]' header [at column index 17] in 'a_REQ2025110600004_metabolite_profiling.txt': [row 1], [row 2], [row 3], [row 4], [row 5], [row 6], [row 7], [row 8], [row 9], [row 10]

overrides.title: Scan Polarity column values are not unique.
overrides.description: Define only one scan polarity value in each assay file.
overrides.violation: 'a_REQ2025110600004_metabolite_profiling.txt', There are multiple scan polarity values in Parameter Value[Scan polarity] column., violated values: negative, positive

overrides.title: Referenced data files not within study FILES folder.
overrides.description: Referenced data files must exist within study FILES folder. Reference data files with format FILES/(sub folder if exists)/(file name) in assay file.
overrides.violation: Violation on 'Derived Spectral Data File' header [at column index 37] in 'a_REQ2025110600004_metabolite_profiling.txt': [row: 001, file name: 'FILES/3injections_inj1_POS.mzML'], [row: 002, file name: 'FILES/3injections_inj2_POS.mzML'], [row: 003, file name: 'FILES/3injections_inj3_POS.mzML'], [row: 004, file name: 'FILES/3samples_sampl1_POS.mzML'], [row: 005, file name: 'FILES/3samples_sampl2_POS.mzML'], [row: 006, file name: 'FILES/3samples_sampl3_POS.mzML'], [row: 007, file name: 'FILES/3injections_inj1_NEG.mzML'], [row: 008, file name: 'FILES/3injections_inj2_NEG.mzML'], [row: 009, file name: 'FILES/3injections_inj3_NEG.mzML'], [row: 010, file name: 'FILES/3samples_sampl1_NEG.mzML']
